Share properties & perfermance

The easiest way to share the properties and performance you used is by exporting the data from the TradingView strategy tester as an Excel file.
To do this, open the strategy tester, click on the strategy name, and select ‘Export Data.’
The video below demonstrates this process. While you can manually enter the details, we highly recommend using the exported file for accuracy and convenience.
